intro: Torreya yunnanensis, commonly known as Yunnan torreya, is a rare evergreen conifer native to China. It belongs to the family Taxaceae, which includes yews and other coniferous trees. The plant is characterized by its slender, cylindrical trunk and dark green, needle-like leaves. It produces small, reddish-brown cones that mature over several years. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
